title: [Plains of Bone, Virktoth's Path]
description: Here, the top of the stairs begin.  A pair of child-sized skeletons flank the stairway, each with arms raised straight above their heads towards the starry sky.  Even in the strongest wind the two skeletons hold their unusual pose.
